Text: When I try to play the game, gamecenter opes by it self. I can't play the game. It's asking me for my password ...everytime

works!!!

Apply patch to the game, and then run it. If it asks for a password in Game Centre, simply click cancel...... The game will start! :) Great thanks, noobish!!!
